items.summary:
On the meditation page, center the entire selected active-session UI block as a single group within the viewport (do not center each element independently). Apply this only to the selected elements identified by these XPaths:
- Canvas: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/canvas[1]
- Canvas container: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]
- Controls container: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]
- Timer element: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]

Reduce the play/pause button container size to be at least 2Ã— smaller (width/height or padding), while keeping the play/pause icon size unchanged. Apply only to the selected button element:
- /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/button[1]

Make the timer display slightly smaller (modest reduction only). Apply only to the selected timer element:
- /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]

Moderately reduce vertical spacing/gaps within the selected controls container so the time input range and volume input range are closer together (more compact, but not tightly stacked). Apply only to the selected controls container:
- /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]
